body:
When invoking the ocm-share-listcommand against an IOP instance configured to integrate
with OC using oc-sciencemesh app:

```
reva-cli v2.7.2 (rev-26024f63168e56edb6dfe8dcbd7fee05c3f04232)
Please use `exit` or `Ctrl-D` to exit this program.
>> login basic
username: test
password: OK
>> ocm-share-list
error: code=CODE_INTERNAL msg="error listing shares" support_trace="11f351488a4e18aa7867fcf8977ad4b0"
```

this results into:

```
{"reqId":"jIhtyyne7ce1PvkBFi4h","level":3,"time":"2022-11-28T15:15:46+00:00","remoteAddr":"10.10.231.204","user":"--","app":"index","method":"POST","url":"\/index.php\/apps\/sciencemesh\/~test\/api\/ocm\/ListShares","message":"Exception: {\"Exception\":\"ReflectionException\",\"Message\":\"Method OCA\\\\ScienceMesh\\\\Controller\\\\RevaController::ListShares() does not exist\",\"Code\":0,\"Trace\":\"#0 \\\/opt\\\/bitnami\\\/owncloud\\\/lib\\\/private\\\/AppFramework\\\/Utility\\\/ControllerMethodReflector.php(50): ReflectionMethod->__construct()\\n#1 \\\/opt\\\/bitnami\\\/owncloud\\\/lib\\\/private\\\/AppFramework\\\/Http\\\/Dispatcher.php(83): OC\\\\AppFramework\\\\Utility\\\\ControllerMethodReflector->reflect()\\n#2 \\\/opt\\\/bitnami\\\/owncloud\\\/lib\\\/private\\\/AppFramework\\\/App.php(100): OC\\\\AppFramework\\\\Http\\\\Dispatcher->dispatch()\\n#3 \\\/opt\\\/bitnami\\\/owncloud\\\/lib\\\/private\\\/AppFramework\\\/Routing\\\/RouteActionHandler.php(47): OC\\\\AppFramework\\\\App::main()\\n#4 \\\/opt\\\/bitnami\\\/owncloud\\\/lib\\\/private\\\/Route\\\/Router.php(344): OC\\\\AppFramework\\\\Routing\\\\RouteActionHandler->__invoke()\\n#5 \\\/opt\\\/bitnami\\\/owncloud\\\/lib\\\/base.php(914): OC\\\\Route\\\\Router->match()\\n#6 \\\/opt\\\/bitnami\\\/owncloud\\\/index.php(54): OC::handleRequest()\\n#7 {main}\",\"File\":\"\\\/opt\\\/bitnami\\\/owncloud\\\/lib\\\/private\\\/AppFramework\\\/Utility\\\/ControllerMethodReflector.php\",\"Line\":50}"}
```

Basically, there is no such method as [`RevaController::ListShares()`](https://github.com/pondersource/oc-sciencemesh/blob/main/lib/Controller/RevaController.php), maybe it should call [`RevaController:: ListReceivedShares()`](https://github.com/pondersource/oc-sciencemesh/blob/main/lib/Controller/RevaController.php#L939) instead?

body:
This is in branch **add-header-styles**
Currently all icons in solid-ui are in the icon directory as svg files, however in mashlib the icon for the header sits in a icon.ts file.  I think I should make this a svg file called header-icon.svg and store it in the icon directory to match the organization of solid-ui, since it will now be in that repository.  Want to get feedback?  

The other thing I have ran into is that the svg (defined in src/header/icon.ts) defines the styling, which is called header-banner__icon.  I'm not quite sure how to do this in jss.
Meaning: I have defined this style in my styleMap.ts.  How might I link this style to an svg? Or do I need to just hardcode this style in the svg itself?
